channel.title: Umm Sprite Help, Please
channel.description:
I'm currently making a client for my friend's server. I'm wondering how to switch the ghorrock teleport icon with a vengeance skull. I have add the sprite to the sprites folder, but now how do i make it appear on the tab?
All help appreciated

item.title: Umm Sprite Help, Please
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

Cant you just use the interface 430?, or is that not coded in old rs servers?

Read full topic

item.title: Umm Sprite Help, Please
item.dc:creator: @19spartan94 19spartan94
item.description:
@19spartan94 wrote:

i would say you rename the vengeance skull to whatever the ghorrok telli is and name ghorrok telli something else… im pretty sure li just think lthat works :D:D:D;D;D;D

Read full topic

item.title: Umm Sprite Help, Please
item.dc:creator: @skullkiller122 skullkiller122
item.description:
@skullkiller122 wrote:

ok here is what i do for the clients main pic it should work same way cuz i do this with skills too… if u have photoshop your good if not look on youtube for downloads from sites and trust me youtube is better than google=)
anyway once you get the program open sprite files with photo shop then get a picture of vengence skull but open it in paint then select it with the dotted [] thingy near the moving mouse symbol thingy once you select it copy it from paint and paste it on top of the current ghorrock tele then save it under its original sprite and it will ask to overwrite it and obviously click yes…and wahlah its done lol ty for reading hope this worked if not my msn is skullkiller1@hotmail.com

Read full topic
